extension.summary: Watch and listen to DRs programming whenever you want
Se og hør DRs programmer når du vil
extension.description: DR (Danish Broadcasting Corporation) provides a variation of their programming as video and audio podcasts, where typically 5-10 of the latest episodes are available online.[CR][CR]If you have comments or suggestions for this addon, please feel free to participate in the debate on my blog at http://tommy.winther.nu

DR udgiver en række af deres programmer som video og lyd podcasts, hvor typisk de seneste 5-10 afsnit er tilgængelige online.[CR][CR]Har du kommentarer, ris eller ros til denne addon er du velkommen til at deltage i debatten på min blog på http://tommy.winther.nu
